revision.text: The '''Squirtbottle''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the chance of [[Berry|mutations]] occurring in the [[Farm]]. Unlike most other Oak Items, it is not unlocked by capturing unique Pokémon and instead can be bought from the [[Johto]] Berry Master in Goldenrod City. It also requires [[Farming Points]] to upgrade instead of Pokédollars.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
